content.text: Match ends, Nice 3, SV Zulte Waregem 1.
Second Half ends, Nice 3, SV Zulte Waregem 1.
Goal!  Nice 3, SV Zulte Waregem 1. Adrien Tameze (Nice) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Arnaud Lusamba.
Foul by Marvin Baudry (SV Zulte Waregem).
Arnaud Lusamba (Nice) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Nice. Marlon Santos replaces Mario Balotelli.
Foul by Sandy Walsh (SV Zulte Waregem).
Walter Benítez (Nice) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Maxime Le Marchand (Nice).
Aaron Leya Iseka (SV Zulte Waregem) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Julien de Sart (SV Zulte Waregem).
Adrien Tameze (Nice) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Nice 2, SV Zulte Waregem 1. Brian Hamalainen (SV Zulte Waregem) from a free kick with a left footed shot to the top right corner.
Davy de Fauw (SV Zulte Waregem) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Mario Balotelli (Nice).
Substitution, SV Zulte Waregem. Ivan Saponjic replaces Idrissa Doumbia.
Substitution, SV Zulte Waregem. Alessandro Cordaro replaces Nill de Pauw.
Substitution, Nice. Arnaud Lusamba replaces Patrick Burner.
Attempt missed. Idrissa Doumbia (SV Zulte Waregem) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left.
Attempt missed. Julien de Sart (SV Zulte Waregem) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.

Substitution, Nice. Adrien Tameze replaces Jean Michael Seri.

Foul by Pierre Lees-Melou (Nice).
Attempt missed. Marvin Baudry (SV Zulte Waregem) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Brian Hamalainen with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  SV Zulte Waregem. Conceded by Christophe Jallet.
Attempt blocked. Jean Michael Seri (Nice) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Nice. Conceded by Sandy Walsh.

Attempt missed. Idrissa Doumbia (SV Zulte Waregem) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Substitution, SV Zulte Waregem. Julien de Sart replaces Grigoris Kastanos.
Second Half begins Nice 2, SV Zulte Waregem 0.
First Half ends, Nice 2, SV Zulte Waregem 0.
Patrick Burner (Nice) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
